23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar: "Indeed we saw the day of Hunain, and indeed the two armies fled from the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and there did not remain one hundred men with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Gharib as a narration of 'Ubaidullah. We do not know of it except from this route

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الثَّبَاتِ عِنْدَ الْقِتَالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Standing Firm During The Time Of Fighting
